name: [GGJ2020] Clock tower
description:
This is a tiny scene made in Unity.  Made for Global Game Jam 2020. Theme was "Repair".

My personal goal was to learn basics of Unity's Probuilder and create small walking simulator. 

Features:

- There is no gameplay.

- There is no ESCAPE button, you need to press ALT+F4 and close game manually. 

- You can walk in circles and watch sun set and rise.

Assets used:

Probuilder, First Person All-in-One, SunControl

Music: "Chill Wave" by Kevin McLeod
